function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate communication and training on safety protocols and new skills for employees returning to work","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Employees concerned about exposure to contagious diseases in the workplace.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Economic uncertainty affecting employees’ ability to meet basic needs.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of centralized document access and communication may lead to inconsistent understanding of protective measures and infection transmission.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential breach of confidential medical information and biased decision-making based on medical conditions may lead to legal and ethical implications.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prioritizing higher-level employee needs without adequately addressing physiological, safety, and social needs may lead to decreased employee well-being and performance.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of dedicated resources to manage prevention measures and ensure compliance.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of comprehensive safety and hygiene training for employees","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to lack of hygiene and cleanliness standards in hotels.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Employees being infected with covid-19","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of contagion for frontline covid-19 fighters","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear communication and guidance leading to anxiety and stress among employees.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in the built environment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"High employee engagement and satisfaction levels may lead to complacency and reduced vigilance in maintaining health and safety protocols, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate consideration of the impact of employee initiatives and strategic plans on disease transmission risk within the built environment","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Disengaged employees can impact on the guest experience and the business loses not only money but reputation as a result.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Talent turnover costs the business in both money and time.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread through close contact among employees and guests","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and training on contagious disease prevention","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate measures for handling employee illness and isolation","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing and hygiene measures in the workplace","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emotional support and engagement with employees","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Non-compliance with legal and regulatory requirements","category":"Legal risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of open and honest discussions about business realities and upcoming plans","category":"Political risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate employee engagement, learning, and development measures","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of financial resources
